channel.title: Mosier-The Dalles Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Mosier-The Dalles Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at Split
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at US-197/US-30 split. Turn right for US-30 west to The Dalles. Turn left for US-197 south to Dufur and Bend.

item.title: US-30 East - SE Frontage Road
item.description: US-30 East at SE Frontage Road. Turn left for the Petersburg School. Merge right for (I-84) Freeway.

item.title: US-30 East - Webber St. at W 2nd St.
item.description: US-30 East - Webber St. at W 2nd St. Turn left for I-84 West to Portland; right for US-30 East to (The Dalles) City Center. Continue on Webber St. for Port Areas.

item.title: US-30 East at Webber St.
item.description: US-30 East (W 6th St.) at Webber St. in The Dalles. Turn left on Webber St. to continue east on US-30 for (The Dalles) City Center and Port Area. Also turn left for I-84 West to Portland.

item.title: US-30 West - The Dalles
item.description: US-30 West (W 2nd St.) at Webber St. Turn left ton Webber St. to continue on US-30 west.

item.title: US-30 East at I-84 East
item.description: US-30 East at I-84 East to Pendleton. Continue east on US-30 for Port Areas and City Center (The Dalles).

item.title: W 2nd St. at US-30 and I-84
item.description: W 2nd St. in The Dalles at US-30 and I-84 east junction. Turn right for I-84 east, to Pendleton, and US-30 west. Continue ahead on 2nd St. for US-30 east. Turn left for the Port Area along the Columbia River.

item.title: W 2nd St. Approaching US-30
item.description: W 2nd St. approaching US-30 in The Dalles.

item.title: US-30 West - Downtown The Dalles
item.description: E 2nd St. west in downtown The Dalles. Use right lanes to continue west on US-30 toward Portland.

item.title: US-30 West at SE Frontage Road
item.description: US-30 west at SE Frontage Road.

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at Split
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at US-197/US-30 split. Turn right for US-30 west to The Dalles. Turn left for US-197 south to Dufur and Bend.
